pages.title: Fission Bomb
pages.text: $(bold)Big explosions for big problems.$() Stack nose->tail: ordinance_fission_initiator_head, ordinance_inline_fission_warhead, ordinance_core, ordinance_fins. Needs 6x implosion_lens and 1x fission_core installed to arm; a fuze is required. Place horizontally with the initiator forward.

pages.name: Layout
pages.text: Left to right = tail to nose. Fins (T), core (C), inline warhead (0), initiator (I). Install lenses and fission core before arming.
